question: My husband came home in anger and said 'I divorce you' three times in one sitting no one present. We have benn living since then in same appartment but with no phisical relationship. Is it divorce
answer:
QUESTION
We have problems in our relationship for more than 3 years now.More than a year ago my husband said 'I divorce you' three times in anger in one sitting. Someone told us that its not considered as divorce. It is only one divorce. We have no marital relationships since than. We still have a lot of problems between us what should we do?
ANSWER


Share:
If your husband issued you three divorces even in one sitting, it will be regarded as three and not one.

Your Nikah will with him has terminated from the time he issued you the divorce. You are not considered his wife anymore.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
